channel.title: HECU marines idle chatter missing?
channel.description: Hi everyone. Not sure if bug or intentional, the HECU marines seem to be missing their idle chatter they originally had in Half-Life. The "squad checks" don't seem to be playing when you're near an active squad, which served to warn you that a marines were nearby, so they regularly surprise me by staying so silent. I'm using the classic HECU voices mod and I miss the "SQUAD. CHECK IN." "UHHHH... YES. SIR." :frowning:

item.title: HECU marines idle chatter missing?
item.dc:creator: grndmrshlgando
item.description:
Hi everyone. Not sure if bug or intentional, the HECU marines seem to be missing their idle chatter they originally had in Half-Life. The “squad checks” don’t seem to be playing when you’re near an active squad, which served to warn you that a marines were nearby, so they regularly surprise me by staying so silent. I’m using the classic HECU voices mod and I miss the “SQUAD. CHECK IN.” “UHHHH… YES. SIR.”

Read full topic
